member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.LowPassFilter
member.summary: Attenuates (reduces) frequencies above the cutoff frequency.

member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.BandPassFilter
member.summary: Attenuates frequencies outside a given range.

member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.HighPassFilter
member.summary: Attenuates frequencies below the cutoff frequency.

member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.NotchFilter
member.summary: Attenuates frequencies inside a given range.

member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.LowPassOnePoleFilter
member.summary: Attenuates frequencies above the cutoff frequency. This is a one-pole filter, and .OneOverQ has no effect.

member.name: XAUDIO2_FILTER_TYPE.HighPassOnePoleFilter
member.summary: Attenuates frequencies below the cutoff frequency. This is a one-pole filter, and .OneOverQ has no effect.
